subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrik Elias ended a streak of 11 games without a goal at exactly the right time last night, scoring with 5 minutes 23 seconds left in the third period for the Devils in a 3-2 victory over the host Pittsburgh Penguins.
snippet: Patrik Elias ended a streak of 11 games without a goal at exactly the right time last night, scoring with 5 minutes 23 seconds left in the third period for the Devils in a 3-2 victory over the host Pittsburgh Penguins.
